p: The mean age of 201 patients with CD was 41.25 ± 15.76 years at examination time, and the mean age of onset of patients was 38.27 ± 16.06 years. Among all CD patients, the ratio of male to female was 77/124. Fifty patients (24.9%) had an age of onset less than 26 years, and forty-one patients (20.4%) had a positive family history of dystonia.
